WeddingPage.PageDescription: You're invited to our wedding in Chiang Mai, Thailand!

About.Message1: We're getting married in beautiful Chiang Mai, Thailand, and we'd be truly honoured to celebrate this special day with you.
About.Message2: This isn't just a wedding—it's a gathering of the people we love most, in one of our favourite places. We understand that travelling from overseas is a big commitment, and while your presence would mean the world to us, we completely understand if you're unable to make the journey.
About.Message3: Whether you're able to attend in person or join us in spirit from afar, we’re grateful to have you in our lives.

Details.Title: Wedding Details
Details.DateClickCap: Click here to save the date!
Details.LoClickCap: Click here to get the map
Details.DressCodeMsg:
Bring the best of you!
No colour them just be yourself.

GiftSection.Title: A Note on Gifts
GiftSection.Message1: In some cultures, it’s customary to give a gift or money at weddings. We want to kindly let you know that:
GiftSection.Message2: Your presence is the only gift we need. Truly, we’re just so happy to celebrate with you—no need to bring anything but your smiles and good vibes.
GiftSection.Message3: We appreciate the time, effort, and cost it takes to travel, and we do not expect anything more.

TravelAccom.Title: Travel & Accommodation
TravelAccom.Message1: We’re working on tips to help you plan your trip to Chiang Mai, including recommended places to stay and what to explore while you're here. Stay tuned!

Rsvp.Title: RSVP
Rsvp.Message1: To help us plan and make your experience as comfortable as possible, please let us know if you'll be joining us in Chiang Mai.
Rsvp.Message2: Kindly fill out the RSVP form — it only takes a minute!

Gallery.Title: Photo Gallery
Gallery.Message1: We'll upload our favorite moments here after the big day—check back soon!
